Class SortingVisualization

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      SortingVisualization

public class SortingVisualization
extends greenfoot.World

Creates a world which can be used to visualize sorting methods by arranging "blocks" on the screen. Each block is it's own object and has a value associated with it. This value is represented visually by it's width and a number display.

(a version number or a date)

(your name)
